title: FREE And Easy KDP Niche Research Strategy For Low Content Books | KDP Success With Ben Chinnock

tactics.name: Amazon Marketplace Filtering
tactics.description: Use Amazon's search filters to identify low-content book niches with recent success
steps: Search for a broad niche category (e.g., 'coloring books')
Filter results to 'New Releases' from the last 30 days
Sort by 'Most Reviews' to identify successful titles
Analyze top-performing books for design and keyword insights
caveats: High competition in popular niches like animal coloring books
source_quotes: we're going to filter it sort it to the most reviews

tactics.name: Competitive Niche Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate niches by filtering new releases and sorting by review count to identify high-potential markets.
steps: Filter search results to last 30 days
Sort by most reviews to assess demand
Compare BSR and review counts across niches
caveats: Niche may have low demand despite less competition
source_quotes: if you look at the ranking here 36 and they've got six reviews

tactics.name: Niche Research Strategy
tactics.description: Compare niches using BSR and review data to identify low-competition, high-success opportunities
steps: Analyze BSR and review count metrics
Select niches with lower competition and higher recent success rates
caveats: May fail if niche data is insufficient
source_quotes: the best one by far was a tattoo coloring book just because the results were a lot lower than the animal coloring book and there was a higher proportion of people doing very well with tattoo coloring books within the past month compared to animal coloring books

heuristics.name: Recent Success Filter
heuristics.condition: If a niche has books with >200 reviews published in last 30 days, it's a viable target
source_quotes: we want to see books published in this niche within the last 30 days

heuristics.name: Review-Driven Niche Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If a niche has fewer than 200 reviews in 30 days, prioritize it for higher success potential
source_quotes: this tattoo coloring book is definitely more attractive

heuristics.name: Recent Success Bias
heuristics.condition: If a niche has low review counts but shows recent success, prioritize it
source_quotes: you can either keep mental notes you can write them down in an excel but i recommend you go for at least 10 niches this way and just you know get like a mental idea of how each niche is performing and that way you can compare them and you know make an informed decision as to which one you're going to publish in based on how many are doing well within the past 30 days

claims.statement: Low-content book niches can be identified using free Amazon marketplace research
source_quotes: this strategy is free so you don't need any paid software

claims.statement: Tattoo coloring books show higher success rates in 30-day windows compared to animal coloring books
source_quotes: this niche although it has less competition has a lot less demand

claims.statement: Niches with lower BSR and higher recent success rates outperform others
source_quotes: the best one by far was a tattoo coloring book just because the results were a lot lower than the animal coloring book and there was a higher proportion of people doing very well with tattoo coloring books within the past month compared to animal coloring books

niche_patterns.example: adult coloring books + stress relief + 20-minute sessions
niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience needs with time/usage constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Limits competition while addressing niche demand
source_quotes: we want to know how much competition there is
